attributes.title: Don't download!! Secret data collection service for the chinese
attributes.review: The trump 2020 app seemed to be a harmless way for me to keep up to date with politics. Upon opening the app it asks for a phone number, I gladly accepted expecting semi-frequent updates on the campaign through texts, instead, my data was sold to numerous chinese companies and I get countless scam offers a day on chinese products. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU DONT WANT YOUR DATA STOLEN
